The config factory registry

  • Constructor Details

    • ConfigFactoryRegistry

      public ConfigFactoryRegistry()

  • Method Details

    • registerDefault

      public void registerDefault()
      Register the default factory for the JSON configuration

    • register

      public void register(String key, ConfigFactory factory)
      Insert factory into the registry, retrievable by using the same key. If the key exists, it will replace the existing factory defined.
      Parameters:
      key - A `String` as the key, case sensitive
      factory - The factory associated with the key

    • unregister

      public ConfigFactory unregister(String key)
      Remove the factory associated with the key from the registry.
      Parameters:
      key - A `String` that is associated to a factory.
      Returns:
      The factory that is associated with the key, returns `null` if the key was not found.

    • getFactory

      public ConfigFactory getFactory(String key)
      Get the factory associated with the key.
      Parameters:
      key - A key to get a factory
      Returns:
      The factory associated with the key, null if no factory is associated with the key

    • create

      public Configurable create(String key, Object obj)
      Create an instance using a factory associated with the key
      Parameters:
      key - The key associated with a factory
      obj - The object to be provided to the factory
      Returns:
      null if the key does not exist, the return value of the factory otherwise
